      <text xml:space="preserve">BioLib reads Affy CEL and CDF files using Ben Bolstad's Affyio package and comes with RMA and quantile normalization (the same implementation as R/Bioconductor).

== API reading ==

* [http://github.com/pjotrp/biolib/tree/master/src/clibs/affyio-1.8/README_BIOLIB Affyio implementation notes] on access of .CEL and .CDF files
* For the current API see [[Main Page#DOCUMENTION]]</text>
